supply.supply_status: POOR - Division severely understrength after El Alamein disaster. Reinforced with tanks (91 total) but chronic fuel/ammunition shortages. Extended supply lines from Sicily/Italy to Tunisia. Allied air superiority disrupts logistics. Operating as battle groups (Kampfgruppen) due to fragmentation.
notes: Reduced to 4 tanks by late Nov 1942, reinforced to 91 by Feb 1943
Allied air attacks on supply convoys from Sicily
